message: Hi Bob, I'm Alice. I'm selling a product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm happy to offer it to you for $140.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $135?
Hi Alice, thanks for the revised offer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to consider this price?
